name: The MS Paint Collection V2 - old

metadata.name: Yao#1
metadata.description: The MS Paint Collection, is the end-product of decades of research and practice in the fine arts. You will notice subtle hints of other greats, such as Leonardo da Vinci, Vincent van Gogh, Michelangelo and Bob Ross. Each work of art takes up to a year to make . By owning a piece of this collection, you are part of history itself. The MS Paint Collection will feature 1 NFT dropped weekly, as these masterpieces take that long to make. The Yao#1 is the first mint of the collection. It has been in the works for over a year, thousands of hours could have gone into creating this master piece. You can obviously see the elegant MS Paint brush strokes and the care that went into creating this piece. In this illustration, you can see the famous Yao Ming Meme face that has been a staple in the meme culture. What a Chad you are for owning this historical piece.
